name: Raptor Combat
description:
Raptor Combat is an ultimate and thrilling modern airstrike jet fighter game which allows you to ride a realistic aircraft simulator. 

Get ready for real breathtaking action while playing this fighter aircraft simulation game.   

FEATURES: 

- Detailed realistic airplanes

- Never ending environment to fly and battle in!

- Aircraft weapons like, homing missiles, and so much more!

- Challenging enemy plane A.I.

- Realistic flying physics!

This is a realistic war simulation. Fly your plane through a storm of missiles and bullets into the war zone! Strike your enemies out of the sky! 

Good luck captain!
